synopsis.text: Yu Xin, a love lost to time, and the enigmatic disappearance of ancient deities and demons propel Chen Nan on an epic quest in a world transformed by the collision of Eastern and Western continents. Resurrected from a modest grave in the hallowed Shenmo Cemetery, Chen Nan finds himself amidst the final resting places of powerful beings that once shaped the Xiuhuan and Mohuan continents. As he grapples with the reality of a world ten thousand years in the future, he embarks on a journey to unravel the truth behind the gods and demons' downfall, the whereabouts of his beloved Yu Xin, and the mystery of his own resurrection. This captivating tale unfolds across the vast six paths, culminating in a celestial game of chess that will determine the fate of heaven and earth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
